name: Pixel Sandbox
description:
I am not the one that made this game all the credit goes to @DogeFan1555

Official Game: Pixel Sandbox

Full Screen not recommended

Please Read: You can put blocks like fences and glass in front of other blocks for some block combinations! The sky (day/night) blocks also are basically erasers too!

Press space to access the block menu and click to place. Use left and right arrow keys to toggle blocks. Everything else is pretty self explanatory

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Official Thread:https://scratch.mit.edu/discuss/topic/339551/
Please comment below about bugs and glitches!
Artwork inspired by Minecraft (by a lot, like, a lot a lot). Music and sound effects from Terraria! Star and heart art from online. Finally, placing script from @JuneBug9427.
I will add more blocks soon!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Updates:

1/30/19: Added eraser button and added the ability to use left and right arrow keys to toggle blocks! Also made the clear button have a sound when clicked! Also added words to you how to exit out block menu

2/7/19: Added stone brick stairs, oakwood logs, and leaf blocks!

2/19/19: Changed the way buttons work, now when you press them they do the action and when they let go they make a sound. Also fixed bug where if you hold on a button in the block menu it would stay be there when you exit the block menu.
